Literature.Title: Exploration of novel cationic amino acid-enriched short peptides: design, SPPS, biological evaluation and in silico study
Literature.Author: Chandole PK, Pawar TJ, Olivares-Romero JL, Tivari SR, Garcia Lara B, Patel H, Ahmad I, Delgado-Alvarado E, Kokate SV, Jadeja Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 443(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1688(MIC=40µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=90µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes MTCC 442(MIC=20µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=20µg/ml),Aspergillus niger MTCC 282(MIC=35µg/ml)
